summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackPromote bright, even skin and less visible pores with Good Molecules Niacinamide Brightening Toner that's gentle enough for daily use.
details: DetailsKey IngredientsNiacinamide (Vitamin B3) - targets uneven skin tone, dullness, and visible pores.Naturally-derived Arbutin - improves the look of hyperpigmentationLicorice Root Extract - soothes inflammationItem 2582308How To UseDispense onto a cotton pad and gently sweep over freshly cleansed skin. Can also be dispensed into palms and patted into skin until fully absorbed. Suitable for daily use.IngredientsWater, Glycerin, Niacinamide, 1,2-Hexanediol, Propanediol, Arbutin, Betaine, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Carbomer, Tromethamine, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Dextrin.
how_to_use: Dispense onto a cotton pad and gently sweep over freshly cleansed skin. Can also be dispensed into palms and patted into skin until fully absorbed. Suitable for daily use.

reviews.headline: Amazing product
reviews.comments: The Good Molecules Niacinamide Brightening Toner has been such a game changer in my skincare routine! The formula feels refreshing and hydrating without being heavy, and it preps my skin perfectly for serums and moisturizer. I love that it has niacinamide to help with brightness and texture, plus the extra soothing ingredients that keep my skin calm and balanced.

reviews.headline: BUY IT
reviews.comments: This product is so amazing! I seriously can't live without it and it's become a part of my every day routine.

reviews.headline: Changed my skin!
reviews.comments: I feel like my skin tone is much more even and my overall complexion is glowing highly rec!

reviews.headline: Skin feels soft and clear
reviews.comments: Of course I use other products as well, but I feel this toner has cleared my face of dark spots and made my skin feel and look smooth as well as bring a glow to it. I have fairly oily skin. While I use other products for that, this toner does help make my makeup look smooth.

reviews.headline: DO NOT GET THIS IF YOU HAVE SENSITIVE SKIN
reviews.comments: I have sensitive skin and I've been looking for a toner to help me with my breakouts, I started using this and it didn't break me out so i thought it was good, but then 3 days later it gave me two huge pimples on my nose, and it's also sticky. So, if you're thinking about trying this, I would recommend getting the smaller size and I would stay away from this product if you have sensitive acne-prone skin.

reviews.headline: NOT for sensitive skin or rosacea girlies
reviews.comments: as soon as i started using this i broke out so badly and had a lot of redness. a week of not using and i still am trying to get rid of the pimples. my skin isnt tooooo sensitive but i definitely have a mild form of rosacea so i wouldnt recommend it for people with similar skin

reviews.headline: Love Good Molecules
reviews.comments: My sister recommended this to me and I love it so much definitely agree

reviews.headline: My go to A M. toner
reviews.comments:
This is lightly hydrating, balancing and brightening
 I use it every morning after cleansing and before any essence or serums. Definitely helps control oils.

reviews.headline: My Go-To!
reviews.comments: 10 STARS

reviews.headline: May forever go to!
reviews.comments: I got immediate results, everyone sround me noticed and my skin looks and feels amazing! Finally, I found what I needed for my sensitive skin and even helped with acne scars.

reviews.headline: idk
reviews.comments: I guess a toner is a toner? Haven't seen any results an i have been using everyday for a month...sometimes twice a day...ppl who claim to see results right after using is cap

reviews.headline: ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ Impressed is an understatement!
reviews.comments: I wasn't expecting to love this toner as much as I do, but wow—it seriously delivered. I've been dealing with uneven tone and stubborn discoloration, and this has made a visible difference fast. My skin looks more even, brighter, and just healthier overall. It feels gentle but still effective, and I love how it layers with the rest of my routine. Definitely a new staple for me. Highly recommend if you're struggling with hyperpigmentation or dullness.

reviews.headline: Second bottle
reviews.comments: This is my second bottle. I haven't seen any change but no irritation. I will finish the bottle and if not results, I will look for something else.

reviews.headline: good but not for me
reviews.comments: hydrating and felt good on my skin, no weird smell but it did break me out

reviews.headline: Buy it again and again and again…
reviews.comments: This is the secret ingredient to me when it comes to your good molecules skin care routine. Its a definite must & is the first thing I use after the pineapple exfoliater.  I think its the starting point for your skincare lineup.

reviews.headline: Amazing. Buy it now.
reviews.comments: This is hands down the best tomer I have ever used. It transformed my skin tone to smooth and mostly clear of breakouts and redness within days. I use a liberal amount 2x a day and am purchasing my second bottle 3 months later.

reviews.headline: I would buy this again
reviews.comments: felt so good on my skin

reviews.headline: Love love love!
reviews.comments: I have gone through many bottles of this and can conclude that it has cleared up my skin and is gentle enough for me to use twice a day as a acne prone/sensative skin girly

reviews.headline: I will buy this product again when I run out
reviews.comments: I love this toner, I found this product using this app called yuka where it scans products and shows the ingredients and this toner has just worked great for me. I love everything from good molecules. But especially this toner
reviews.location: Orlando florida ulta at the loop

reviews.headline: Feeling kind of mixed
reviews.comments: I feel like it makes my skin look really nice, reduces some of my redness and brightens it. My only problem is how tacky it feels once it dries. It leaves the tackiness that I don't love. Otherwise it feels nice and gentle.

media.headline: A great toner for mature skin
media.caption: I love this toner.

faceoff_positive.comments: I've had acne , scars, breakouts, you name it. My skin is fairly normal but can get a little oily and i had those annoying little bumps(clogged pores) on my forehead. I used this product along with the Tula facewash and moisturizer because the Tula toner burned my skin. Let me tell you, this product works amazingly!! I saw results very quickly within the first couple of uses. I usually use this once to twice a day and it has been great. It leaves my skin feeling bright, fresh, and smooth. I think that it has also helped my acne and scars clear drastically. DONT GIVE UP! I almost did on skin care routines because nothing worked throughout high school, work, pregnancy, and years of trying different products. I even went to a dermatologist and nothing worked. This product has helped me feel so much more confident. The only thing is it does feel slightly sticky to the touch when applied but i like the feeling because oddly enough its like a smooth clean sticky.(Lol if that makes sense) some might find it annoying but i kind of like it, and it goes away quickly. MIRACLE PRODUCT MUST HAVE!! Also a plus its a huge cute glass bottle!
faceoff_positive.headline: MIRACLE PRODUCT!!

faceoff_negative.comments:
I feel like the odd one out with this product line. I bought several Good Molecules items, and nothing worked for me. 

This toner sat on my skin for hours, sticky to the touch, which meant it was only good at night. I tried using it in the morning and blotting with a tissue to solve the stickiness, but then my face looked too shiny unless I covered it up with a matte foundation or powder. I had this same issue with the niacinamide toner (which I only used once before discontinuing). 

I also have mild rosacea (flushed skin rather than breakouts), and after using this product for two weeks, I was receiving comments that my face looked more red than before. That's when I finally gave up. 

While the redness issue is more on me, I'm surprised there's not one other person among these 168 reviews who felt the product was unabsorbent. Maybe I got a bad batch?
faceoff_negative.headline: Didn't absorb, increased redness
